alert.note: Alert for Pine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 1:13AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF PINE AND SOUTHWESTERN BURNETT COUNTIES THROUGH 145 AM CDT... At 112 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Willow River, to 6 miles northeast of Pine City, to near Rush City, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. Heavy rain also expected. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pine City, Hinckley, Sandstone, Rock Creek, Grantsburg, Trade Lake, Willow River, Askov, Rutledge, Bruno, Duxbury, Branstad, Mille Lacs Band Lena Lake Area, Randall, Finlayson, Nickerson, Kerrick, Falun, Duquette, and Banning State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
